summary: Alphabet Inc. is a huge tech company based in California. It's the second-largest tech company in the world, after Apple. Alphabet was created in 2015 to be the parent company of Google and other related businesses. It's part of the top five American tech companies, along with Amazon, Apple, Meta, and Microsoft. The founders, Larry Page and Sergey Brin, stepped down in 2019, and Sundar Pichai became the CEO. Page and Brin still own the company and work there.
title: Alphabet Inc.
